TransitionText: You're hanging out with friends and they all start joking around.
You're relaxing at home and your puppy randomly pees on the floor.
You're in class and your professor extends the project deadline.
Your partner gets you a big boquet of flowers for Valentine's Days.
Your partner tells their friend they has no plans on Valentine's Day.
Your partner brings you to Mc Donalds for dinner on Valentine's Day.
You know who you want to express your anger to and they're free.
You know who you want to express your anger to but there not free.
You don't have anyone to express your anger to because you have no friends.
Everyone is laughing because they thought your joke was funny.
No one's laughing because your joke wasn't funny to anyone.
You decide to keep telling jokes even if they might not be as funny.
You're coding and everything works after your first time running it.
You're trying to fix a bug in your code and you just mess it up even more.
You're making slow but steady progress on your programming project.
After trying for weeks your puppy finally understands a new trick.
You go out to party with your friends to forget all your problems.
The TV show you're watching is boring but then the main character dies.
You're at a party drinking with your friends and you get a little giggly.
After a good time all the guests at your party start heading out.
You're opening gifts at your birthday party an someone gets you something expensive.
You decide to tell your crush you like them and they say they like you back.
You decide to tell your crush you like them and they don't like you back.
You decide to tell your crush you like them and they say they actually like your best friend.
